metadata.title: Friday, 28th March, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) why health facilities in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency are subjected to loadshedding by Zesco Limited despite the Presidential directive not to loadshedd health facilities; and
(b) what urgent measures are being taken to ensure that the health facilities are not load shedded in order to prevent loss of life.
(a) why local applicants in each district were not prioritised during the 2025 Teacher Recruitment Exercise;
(b) why the exercise was not decentralised to each district; and
(c) whether local applicants in each district who were left out will be prioritised during the teacher replacement exercise.
